SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.object.component

Class ComponentObject

java.lang.Object
civitas.celestis.object.BaseObject
civitas.celestis.object.component.ComponentObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObjectComponent, Movable, Physical, Placeable, Renderable, Tickable, Unique
public class ComponentObject extends BaseObject implements ObjectComponent
An object which is also an object component. These objects can be used to created child objects of other objects.

      public ComponentObject(@Nonnull UUID uniqueId, @Nonnull Vector3 location, @Nonnull Quaternion rotation, @Nonnull PhysicsProfile physicsProfile, @Nonnull Model model)
      Creates a new component object.
      Parameters:
      uniqueId - The unique identifier of this object
      location - The location of this object
      rotation - The rotation of this object
      physicsProfile - The physical profile of this object
      model - The graphical model of this object

    • ComponentObject

      public ComponentObject(@Nonnull UUID uniqueId, @Nonnull Vector3 location, @Nonnull Vector3 acceleration, @Nonnull Quaternion rotation, @Nonnull Quaternion rotationRate, @Nonnull PhysicsProfile physicsProfile, @Nonnull Model model, @Nonnull List<ObjectComponent> components)
      Creates a new component object.
      Parameters:
      uniqueId - The unique identifier of this object
      location - The location of this object
      acceleration - The acceleration of this object
      rotation - The rotation of this object
      rotationRate - The rate of rotation of this object
      physicsProfile - The physical profile of this object
      model - The graphical model of this object
      components - The list of initial components of this object

  • Method Details

    • onAdded

      public void onAdded(@Nonnull BaseObject parent)
      Called when this component has been added to an object.

      If this object was added to itself as a component, this will immediately remove itself from the list of components. This ensures that a component object will not be added to itself.

      Specified by:
      onAdded in interface ObjectComponent
      Parameters:
      parent - The parent object this component was added to
